name: Minesweeper Classic Board Game
description:
Play the retro PC classic game Minesweeper, updated and re-imagined for iPad and iPhone with a clean modern interface and graphics!

The aim of the game is to clear the mine field without hitting any of the mines. Tap on a mine and it is game over!

The game comes complete with various modes - easy, medium and hard - challenging for all ages, kids, teens and adults! Classic retro fun for all of the family.

Download now for free!
